After almost 7 thousand generations, the champion topology only had 2 hidden 
nodes.  One had two connections, one had about 10.  At this rate, I'll be 
old and gray before it gets anywhere.

Any ideas how to speed up the process of adding topology without losing the 
ability to optimize and thoroughly evaluate those topologies?
